front.title: Benchmarking Methodology for EVPN and PBB-EVPN

abstract.t: This document defines the methodologies for benchmarking performance of EVPN and PBB-EVPN.EVPN is defined in RFC 7432.It is being deployed in provider network.This document provides the benchmarking methodologies for EVPN/PBB-EVPN convergence,data plane,control plane learning of mac.
